value.title: StarCraft 2: THE MOST PAINFUL MATCH EVER? (Florencio's Cheese)
value.excerpt: A very fun match of StarCraft 2. This has to be one of the most painful and smartest games of StarCraft I've casted. In this game Florencio combines two flavours of cheese to create the perfect early game push.  Florencio on Twitch: http://twitch.tv/florenciosc  Get more videos & support my work: http://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: The UNEXPECTED World Champion! (Grand Finals)
value.excerpt: The Grand Finals of the StarCraft 2 World Championships played at IEM Katowice. In this video I cast the Terran versus Terran that was played between Oliveira (TIME) and Maru. The winner of this match is the new StarCraft 2 World Champion.  Photos used in the video are made by ESL: https://twitter.com/ESLSC2/

value.title: StarCraft 2: TURTLE ROYALE! (Pro Gamer FFA)
value.excerpt: StarCraft 2 Battle Royale 6-man free-for-all between Maru, SuperNova, Taeja, Stats, Patience and Ragnarok. While it is a Battle Royale, both games very quickly become a Turtle Royale instead, as players try to control the center with as much static defense as possible.  Get more videos & support my work:

value.title: How to beat the 1v7 INSANE AI Challenge (no, Beastyqt has not done it) #2 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I have challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Serral has said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs. After Spirit (Soul) tried it first, the next person brave enough to try it is PiLiPiLi, a Protoss player. He took on 7 Random insane AIs all on Any Build.
